about_the_game:
"Forgenator" is an adventure and crafting game where players are immersed in a magical world full of mysteries and challenges. Taking on the role of a skilled apprentice smith, players embark on a journey to become master craftsmen, with the guidance of a powerful mage.

In the game, players explore a variety of picturesque settings, from enchanted forests to dark caverns and monster-infested dungeons. The mentor mage instructs them in the arts of the forge, revealing ancient secrets and magical techniques to create powerful weapons, armor, and items.

Players must use rare and magical resources such as gold ores and enchantment books. They must also face exciting challenges, including mystical creatures and deadly traps, in order to win.

As they progress through the journey, players will improve their forging skills and unlock new recipes and techniques. They can customize their items, adding enchantments and ores to increase their power and create unique weapons.

With pixel art graphics, an immersive soundtrack and intuitive gameplay mechanics, "Forgenator" offers an exciting experience for players who want to test their agility and forge strategies. Get ready to unlock the secrets of the magic forge and become a true master craftsman in this epic crafting game.

Multiplayer mode
Forgenator allows up to 4 simultaneous players.
It is possible to play with 1 player using the keyboard and another 3 on controllers, or 4 players using controllers.

This game has no online mode.
